_header: Thou wouldst of riches have and know
Subjects: precepts, moral; wealth, wise use of; glosses; translations
_description: Couplets scattered in text of Bernardus Sylvestris, Experimentaris…

NYPL120.Transcription:
hu wuldist of riches haue & knoweButt thu shalt neuer
                    hym owe
NYPL120.Note:
Added to right margin by original scribe, as a gloss beside Latin text
                    it translates; ‘haue’ added above line by original
                    scribe.
